dct_title_s: Battles of Mexico. Survey of the line of operations of the U.S. Army, under the command of Major General Winfield Scott on the 19th & 20th of August 1847
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially. Inset: Route of Shields' & Pierce's brigades & rifles. From: Battles of Mexico ... New-York : [Martin & Ely], 1847. Includes positions and numbers of troops, and casualty statistics for the battles of Contreras and Churubusco.
dct_subject_sm: Churubusco, Battle of, Mexico City, Mexico, 1847—Maps
dcat_theme_sm: Churubusco, Battle of, Mexico City, Mexico, 1847—Maps
